trans-unit.source: Use content element relation:If set, content elements can be added to news records.
trans-unit.target: ប្រើ​ទំនាក់ទំនង​ធាតុ​មាតិកា៖​ប្រសិន​បើសំណុំ​ធាតុ​មាតិកាអាចត្រូវបានបន្ថែម​ទៅកាន់ការកត់ត្រាព័ត៌មាន។

trans-unit.source: Improved preview of content element relations:If set, the preview in the backend is rendered as in the page module.
trans-unit.target: Improved preview of content element relations:If set, the preview in the backend is rendered as in the page module.

trans-unit.source: Define pid of tag records:Tags are collected on one central page.
trans-unit.target: កំណត់ pid នៃការកត់ត្រា​ស្លាក៖ស្លាក​ត្រូវបានប្រមូលនៅលើទំព័រ​កណ្តាល​មួយ។

trans-unit.source: Archive Date: Define if the archive date is a "Date" or "Date & Time"
trans-unit.target: កាលបរិច្ឆេទ​រក្សាទុក៖​ប្រសិនបើ​បានកំណត់កាលបរិច្ឆេទជា"ថ្ងៃ"ឬ​"កាលបរិច្ឆេទនិងពេលវេលា"

trans-unit.target: Show administration module:Backend module to administrate news records

trans-unit.target: Enable a RTE for the teaser field.

trans-unit.source: Disable required date field:If set, the date field is not required and not filled automatically when creating a new record.
trans-unit.target: Disable required date field:If set, the date field is not required and not filled automatically when creating a new record.

trans-unit.source: Hide page tree for Administration module: To simplify the usability, hide the page tree for the administration module.
trans-unit.target: Hide page tree for Administration module: To simplify the usability, hide the page tree for the administration module.

trans-unit.source: Show thumbnails in backend list module: If enabled, the list module will show thumbnails of the media items.
trans-unit.target: Show thumbnails in backend list module: If enabled, the list module will show thumbnails of the media items.

trans-unit.source: Advanced preview configuration for media files: If enabled, more options are available for editors defining where an media element should be displayed.

Help supporting further development
Why?

trans-unit.source: The news extension is a powerful tool with a lot of features, always trying to thrive on the latest possibilities of the TYPO3 core. This implies a lot of work bringing this to the TYPO3 community.
trans-unit.target: The news extension is a powerful tool with a lot of features, always trying to thrive on the latest possibilities of the TYPO3 core. This implies a lot of work bringing this to the TYPO3 community.
How?

trans-unit.source: There are multiple ways to support the further development:
trans-unit.target: There are multiple ways to support the further development:
Invoice
An invoice is possible!

trans-unit.source: I can create a proper invoice to keep your accounting happy - contact me for details.
trans-unit.target: I can create a proper invoice to keep your accounting happy - contact me for details.
Support me on patreon.com

trans-unit.source: Support me on patreon and get access to additional extensions and snippets as reward.
trans-unit.target: Support me on patreon and get access to additional extensions and snippets as reward.
Donate via PayPal

trans-unit.source: Support me by a donation on paypal.com. It is just one click away.
trans-unit.target: Support me by a donation on paypal.com. It is just one click away.
Amazon wishlist
